name: Feedr
tagline: Automated messaging for the Twitter platform
body:
# Welcome

Increase productivity with Feedr, a service that periodically Tweetâ€™s text and images from online XML sources.

Before any customization, Feedr will Tweet:

* Title of the new content entry
* URL to the new content entry
* Relevant hashtag(s)
* Relevant image

Here's an example of [Feedr in action](https://twitter.com/ValveTime/status/552918907053674496)...

![Feedr in Action](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/housed/feedr/master/doc/img/example_tweet.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
